body_html:
Thanks! I really want to accept this, but I cannot (it would save a lot of headache).

I should never have put dates on these, and probably should remove them. We'd be breaking too many people and we won't actually remove these functions, probably until we reorganize contrib as a whole.

I'm sorry about this. I should remove the dates, since they're misleading.

I'm sorry about this. I should remove the dates, since they're misleading.
body:
Thanks! I really want to accept this, but I cannot (it would save a lot of headache).

I should never have put dates on these, and probably should remove them. We'd be breaking too many people and we won't actually remove these functions, probably until we reorganize contrib as a whole. 

I'm sorry about this. I should remove the dates, since they're misleading.
